text: Ezɨ kɨ orazi, me inabazir gumazamizir osizirim inizibar dɨbobonim dɨbori. Me 144,000plan gumazamiziba, inabazir osizirim me garɨsi, me Israelɨn kantrin aven itir 12plan anababa, vaghvagha men varazira, osizirim ini.7:4 Osizirir kamnagh “Israelɨn kantrin aven itir 12plan anababar,” gun mɨgei. E Aruamu e ghaze, anabam, kar amebam o amizimɨn ghuzim. Ezɨ Israelia me ghaze, anabam, kar afeziamɨn ghuzim, egha me afeziabar gɨn zui.
